executable.title: EMSegment Command-line
executable.description: EMSegment command-line module description and help.
executable.acknowledgements: Many people and organizations have contributed to the funding, design, and development of the EMSegment algorithm and its various implementations.

file.name: mrmlSceneFileName
file.description: Active MRML scene that contains EMSegment algorithm parameters.
file.label: MRML Scene

file.name: resultVolumeFileName
file.description: The file name that the segmentation result volume will be written to.
file.label: Result Labelmap

file.name: targetVolumeFileNames
file.description: File names of target volumes (to be segmented). The number of target images must be equal to the number of target images specified in the parameter set, and these images must be spatially aligned.
file.label: Target Volumes

file.name: atlasVolumeFileNames
file.description: File names of atlas (spatial) probability maps. The number of atlas volumes must match the number specified in the parameter set. The ordering must match the ordering defined in the mrml parameters file.
file.label: Atlas Volumes

directory.name: intermediateResultsDirectory
directory.description: Directory where EMSegmenter will write intermediate data (e.g., aligned atlas data).
directory.label: Intermediate Results Directory

string.name: parametersMRMLNodeName
string.description: The name of the EMSegment parameters node within the active MRML scene. Leave blank for default.
string.label: Parameters Node Name

file.name: resultStandardVolumeFileName
file.description: Used for testing. Compare segmentation results to this image and return EXIT_FAILURE if they do not match.
file.label: Result Standard Image

boolean.name: dontWriteResults
boolean.description: Used for testing. Don't actually write the resulting labelmap to disk.
boolean.label: Don't write results.

file.name: generateEmptyMRMLSceneAndQuit
file.description: Used for testing. Only write a scene with default mrml parameters.
file.label: Write default scene.

file.name: resultMRMLSceneFileName
file.description: Write out the MRML scene after command line substitutions have been made.
file.label: Output MRML scene filename.

boolean.name: disableCompression
boolean.description: Don't use compression when writing result image to disk.
boolean.label: Disable compression.
